divs: Sighting DetailsThe are is by an airport, so I see lights (airplanes) nightly. But this was different. It was like I was seeing it from a distance, but it was above me. No flashing lights. Moving maybe 40 mph. Orb was about 5, 6x bigger than an average airplane overhead. It took around 10 minutes to get out of sight, I saw it one second... didn't the other.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hudson
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Airplane-like orb overhead. Around 40 mph moving from SW to NW.
